text: Driver Dan's Story Train is a British-Emirati children's CGI-animated story series. It was created and designed by Rebecca Elgar. It is a co-production between Two Four 54 in the United Arab Emirates and 3Line Media in the United Kingdom. It was the first CGI animated/live-action property to be produced in both English and Arabic, which each have its own separate versions of the program. It debuted on CBeebies and Al Jazeera Children's Channel on 9 January 2010. It was shown by Sprout, CBeebies, and ABC2. Category:CBeebies Category:2010 British television series debuts Category:Children's television series Category:Children's entertainment
title: Driver Dan's Story Train
